name: Ballaria Demo
description:
An adventure awaits! 

Travel through the lands, earn abilities, and discover secrets as a metal rolling ball!

Since this is only a demo, there are only 5 levels. 

In the future, there should be about 5 worlds - the first tutorial world has 5 levels (playable in the demo), then the next three worlds will have 10 levels, and the final world has 5 levels again (hardest one). 

Each world will have its own mechanics.

Any feedback highly appreciated!
